member.name: M:UserService.Controllers.UserProfilesController.GetUserProfile(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves a specific user profile by ID.
member.param: The ID of the user profile.
member.returns: The user profile if found, or a not found message.

member.name: M:UserService.Controllers.UserProfilesController.PutUserProfile(System.Int32,UserService.Models.UserProfile)
member.summary: Updates a specific user profile by ID.
member.param: The ID of the user profile.
member.returns: No content if the update is successful, or an error message.

member.name: M:UserService.Controllers.UserProfilesController.PostUserProfile(UserService.Models.UserProfile)
member.param: The user profile data to create.

member.name: M:UserService.Controllers.UserProfilesController.DeleteUserProfile(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a specific user profile by ID.
member.param: The ID of the user profile.
member.returns: No content if the deletion is successful, or a not found message.
